localised_description.last_approved_text: Smaller than their powerful Bretonnian equivalents, barding protects Imperial warhorses from blows that would otherwise fell these proud beasts.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Smaller than their powerful Bretonnian equivalents, barding protects Imperial warhorses from blows that would otherwise fell these proud beasts.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The swiftest of mounts – whether on land or in the skies – pegasi hooves can smash a man’s head in with a single blow.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: The swiftest of mounts – whether on land or in the skies – pegasi hooves can smash a man’s head in with a single blow.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Part-lion, part-bird of prey, their hooked beaks easily severing the limbs of those who get too close.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Part-lion, part-bird of prey, their hooked beaks easily severing the limbs of those who get too close.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Descended from the wild ponies of Kislev, Imperial warhorses are suited to harsher climates.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The altar prominently features a noble griffon bearing Ghal Maraz, Sigmar’s hammer and the emblem of Imperial unity and strength.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ghorst and his Undead brothers, forever on the road to damnation. Even death cannot break the bond between them.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Ghorst and his Undead brothers, forever on the road to damnation. Even death cannot break the bond between them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Deadly giant bats the size of dragons, capable of plucking men from the field and stunning warhorses into paralysis.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Deadly giant bats the size of dragons, capable of plucking men from the field and stunning warhorses into paralysis.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Stronger and faster than the mightiest warhorse, these intelligent beasts are exceptionally loyal to their noble masters.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Stronger and faster than the mightiest warhorse, these intelligent beasts are exceptionally loyal to their noble masters.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Fierce beasts that will fight to the death any who enter their territory – be that man or dragon!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Amongst the foulest-smelling creatures imaginable, these ignoble beasts are highly-prized mounts for Boss and Shaman alike.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Amongst the foulest-smelling creatures imaginable, these ignoble beasts are highly-prized mounts for Boss and Shaman alike.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Stubborn and vicious, the warboar is a tough, dangerous, notoriously bad-tempered beast whose behaviour can be worryingly unpredictable.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Stubborn and vicious, the warboar is a tough, dangerous, notoriously bad-tempered beast whose behaviour can be worryingly unpredictable.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Driven mad by the stench of blood, they are eager to trample their prey into the dirt.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Driven mad by the stench of blood, they are eager to trample their prey into the dirt.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Covered in heavy barding and spikes to tear the flesh of their foes.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Covered in heavy barding and spikes to tear the flesh of their foes.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Powerful Dark Magic saturated the bones of long-dead dragons, raising them to new purpose.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Powerful Dark Magic saturated the bones of long-dead dragons, raising them to new purpose.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Covered in heavy barding and spikes, to tear the flesh of their foes.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Driven mad by the stench of blood, they are eager to trample their prey into the dirt.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The bond between rider and steed goes beyond friendship or family; they act as one.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: The bond between rider and steed goes beyond friendship or family; they act as one.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Fly on your wings, like an eagle. Touch the sun. Track the foe, ambush, and defeat.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Fly on your wings, like an eagle. Touch the sun. Track the foe, ambush, and defeat.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Hailing from deep within the forests of the Old World, this dragon breathes deadly, poisonous fumes instead of fire.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As large as an Imperial warhorse and thrice as fierce – a most appropriate mount for a Night Goblin Warboss!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Savage and ill-tempered - even for a warboar - Spleenrippa takes Wurrzag wherever Da Great Green Prophet’s lunacy dictates.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The swiftest of mounts – whether on land or in the skies – pegasi hooves can smash a man’s head in with a single blow.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: The swiftest of mounts – whether on land or in the skies – pegasi hooves can smash a man’s head in with a single blow.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Descended from the wild ponies of Kislev, Imperial warhorses are suited to harsher climates.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Descended from the wild ponies of Kislev, Imperial warhorses are suited to harsher climates.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Smaller than their powerful Bretonnian equivalents, barding protects Imperial warhorses from blows that would otherwise fell these proud beasts.

localised_description.last_approved_text: "Wyverns is good fer one thing, eatin' smashin' smellin' and flyin'. They're also good fer lettin' the other boyz know who's Boss!"

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: "Wyverns is good fer one thing, eatin' smashin' smellin' and flyin'. They're also good fer lettin' the other boyz know who's Boss!"

localised_description.last_approved_text: Taller than a pony, the giant wolf is a slavering beast with a ravenous appetite.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Taller than a pony, the giant wolf is a slavering beast with a ravenous appetite.

localised_description.last_approved_text: These venomous creatures grow to an enormous size, sucking the lifeforce from their prey and leaving only dry husks behind.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: These venomous creatures grow to an enormous size, sucking the lifeforce from their prey and leaving only dry husks behind.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Taller than a pony, the giant wolf is a slavering beast with a ravenous appetite.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Stubborn and vicious, the warboar is a tough, dangerous, notoriously bad-tempered beast whose behaviour can be worryingly unpredictable.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Stubborn and vicious, the warboar is a tough, dangerous, notoriously bad-tempered beast whose behaviour can be worryingly unpredictable.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Amongst the foulest-smelling creatures imaginable, these ignoble beasts are highly-prized mounts for Boss and Shaman alike.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Driven mad by the stench of blood, they are eager to trample their prey into the dirt.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Driven mad by the stench of blood, they are eager to trample their prey into the dirt.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Powerful Dark Magic saturates the bones of long-dead dragons, raising them to new purpose.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Powerful Dark Magic saturates the bones of long-dead dragons, raising them to new purpose.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Covered in heavy barding and spikes, to tear the flesh of their foes.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Covered in heavy barding and spikes, to tear the flesh of their foes.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A magnet to Dark Magic, the cart draws power from the land to raise the dead or improve their fighting prowess.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: A magnet to Dark Magic, the cart draws power from the land to raise the dead or improve their fighting prowess.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Its brazier burning with supernatural flames, the cart spits warpstone – and the madness therein – upon enemy Wizards in its path.

units_custom_battle_mounts.localised_description: Its brazier burning with supernatural flames, the cart spits warpstone – and the madness therein – upon enemy Wizards in its path.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Some corpse carts have a great bell mounted upon them, its ominous knell drawing the dead back to shambling Unlife.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Once the mounts of evil Kings, the sorcery used continues to protect them long after death.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Only bones remain of their mortal forms, protected from attack by barding.
